Title: Lights! Camera! Action!
Plot: The production of Lez Girls starts and Jenny runs into unexpected difficulties. When Adele impresses her on location scouting, Jenny treats her to a makeover. Dawn and Cindi try their best to sabotage Kit's business. Phyllis' daughter Molly catches Shane's eye. Meanwhile, Tina and Bette rekindle their passion.
GuestStars: Wendy Glenn, Angela Gots, Chelah Horsdal, Dominic Zamprogna
